## Vulnerabilities | CVE | Severity | CVSS | Dependency | Type | Fixed in | Remediation Available | | ------------- | ------------- | ----- | ----- | ----- | --- | --- | | [CVE-2022-28948](https://vuln.whitesourcesoftware.com/vulnerability/CVE-2022-28948) | High | 7.5 | github.com/stretchr/objx-v0.4.0 | Transitive | N/A | ❌ | ## Details
CVE-2022-28948 ### Vulnerable Library - github.com/stretchr/objx-v0.4.0

Go package for dealing with maps, slices, JSON and other data.

Dependency Hierarchy: - github.com/stretchr/testify-v1.7.4 (Root Library) - :x: **github.com/stretchr/objx-v0.4.0** (Vulnerable Library)

Found in HEAD commit: abdc156ceaceddbfdb174aece189110e26de36f8

Found in base branch: master

### Vulnerability Details

An issue in the Unmarshal function in Go-Yaml v3 causes the program to crash when attempting to deserialize invalid input.

Publish Date: 2022-05-19

URL: CVE-2022-28948

comments.body: :heavy_check_mark: This issue was automatically closed by Mend because the vulnerable library in the specific branch(es) was either marked as ignored or it is no longer part of the Mend inventory.
